mapper.select: SELECT score,type,assess_date as assessDate,t_personalinfo.name,apprival_date as apprivalDate,state FROM t_performsum,t_personalinfo WHERE t_performsum.job_id=#{0} and state='审核完成' and t_performsum.approver_id=t_personalinfo.job_id ORDER BY assessDate desc LIMIT #{1},#{2}
select count(*) from t_performsum WHERE job_id=#{jobId}

SELECT t_performsum.job_id as jobId,t_personalinfo.name,score,type,assess_date as assessDate,state FROM t_performsum,t_personalinfo WHERE t_performsum.job_id in(SELECT job_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE department_id=(SELECT department_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE t_personalinfo.job_id=#{jobId})) and t_personalinfo.job_id<>#{jobId} and state='待审核' and t_personalinfo.job_id=t_performsum.job_Id LIMIT #{before},#{after}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_performsum,t_personalinfo WHERE t_performsum.job_id in(SELECT job_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE department_id=(SELECT department_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE t_personalinfo.job_id=#{jobId})) and t_personalinfo.job_id<>#{jobId} and state='待审核' and t_personalinfo.job_id=t_performsum.job_Id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_performsum WHERE job_id IN (SELECT manager_id FROM t_department WHERE manager_id<>#{jobId}) and state='待审核'
SELECT t_occupation.occupation_name FROM t_personalinfo,t_occupation WHERE t_occupation.occupation_id=t_personalinfo.occupation_id and t_personalinfo.job_id=#{jobId}

SELECT t_performsum.job_id as jobId,t_personalinfo.name,score,type,assess_date as assessDate,state FROM t_performsum,t_personalinfo WHERE t_performsum.job_id= (SELECT job_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE occupation_id= (SELECT occupation_id FROM t_occupation WHERE occupation_name='总经理')) AND t_performsum.job_id=t_personalinfo.job_id and state='待审核' LIMIT #{before},#{after}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_performsum WHERE t_performsum.job_id= (SELECT job_id FROM t_personalinfo WHERE occupation_id= (SELECT occupation_id FROM t_occupation WHERE occupation_name='总经理')) AND state='待审核'

SELECT p.job_id,i.name as Pname,department_name,occupation_name,score,type,assess_date,f.name as Aname,apprival_date,state FROM t_performsum as p INNER JOIN t_personalinfo as i ON p.job_id=i.job_id INNER JOIN t_personalinfo as f ON p.approver_id=f.job_id INNER JOIN t_department as d ON d.department_id=i.department_id INNER JOIN t_occupation as o ON o.occupation_id=i.occupation_id WHERE p.job_id=i.job_id and state='审核完成' ORDER BY department_name,occupation_name LIMIT #{before},#{after}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_performsum WHERE state='审核完成'

SELECT p.job_id,i.name as Pname,department_name,occupation_name,score,type,assess_date,f.name as Aname,apprival_date,state FROM t_performsum as p INNER JOIN t_personalinfo as i ON p.job_id=i.job_id INNER JOIN t_personalinfo as f ON p.approver_id=f.job_id INNER JOIN t_department as d ON d.department_id=i.department_id INNER JOIN t_occupation as o ON o.occupation_id=i.occupation_id WHERE p.job_id=i.job_id and state='审核完成' and p.job_id<>(SELECT manager_id FROM t_department WHERE department_name='管理层') ORDER BY apprival_date LIMIT #{before},#{after}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_performsum WHERE state='审核完成' and job_id<>(SELECT manager_id FROM t_department WHERE department_name='管理层')
